workshop.controllers.internal.rest

Class ClassifiersRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<Classifier>
      • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.ClassifiersRestController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkshopRestController<Classifier>

    @RestController
 @RequestMapping(path="/internal/classifiers",
                produces="application/hal+json;charset=UTF-8")
 @ExposesResourceFor(value=Classifier.class)
public class ClassifiersRestController
extends WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<Classifier>

      • deleteTask

        @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}/tasks/{taskId}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(#authentication, \'Task\', \'put\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> deleteTask(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                    @PathVariable(name="taskId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.Long taskId)
        Just removes Task from a given Classifier
        Parameters:
        id - Classifier id
        taskId - Task id
        Returns:
        A Task without this Classifier.
